grievance_text: Garbage was not being lifted near the market for 3 days. After complaint, it was cleared.
Big potholes on main road causing accidents. Complaint pending for weeks, no update.
Streetlight near school was not working. Fixed quickly. Good response.
Drain overflowing with sewage and bad smell. Took too long to resolve and no one informed us.
No water supply since last week. Pipeline leak reported but still pending.
Low water pressure in morning. Resolved after 4 days.
Garbage dump cleared in one day. Please maintain regular pickup.
Mosquito breeding due to stagnant water. Fogging delayed; still many mosquitoes.
Waterlogging after rain near bus stop. Cleared drains and it improved.
Road repair promised but not done. Same issue again. Very unhappy with delays.
Two street lamps flickering. Repaired after several reminders.
Overflowing community bin cleaned. Satisfied.
Sewage overflow continues even after closure previously. Recurring issue, worst service.
Broken footpath near clinic. Repaired after a week.
Illegal hawkers blocking footpath. Action taken but they returned again.
Light repaired same day. Thank you.
Potholes getting worse. Accident risk. No response from department.
Water pipeline leak near my house. It was fixed but area not restored properly.
Garbage pickup irregular. Improved after complaint.
Construction noise late night. Enforcement delayed and no follow-up.
Stray dogs near park were relocated after complaint.
No water for 10 days. Multiple complaints. Still pending, no update.
Garbage overflow at corner. Cleared after 4 days.
Stagnant water in lane and mosquitoes. Delay in cleaning drains.
Street light fixed quickly.
Sewage line broken, foul smell. Pending for weeks. No action.
Road patchwork poor quality, potholes back again.
Cleaning team attended and removed waste. Good.
Encroachment complaints closed without real action. Same vendors returned.
Fogging done after rain. Helped reduce mosquitoes.
Noise reduced after warning. Took some time.
Dog bite risk near school. Team visited after 2 days.
Repeated complaints. Still delay and no proper repair. Very dissatisfied.
Intermittent water. Fixed after 5 days.
Garbage lifted. Satisfied.
Drain cleaning delayed; waterlogging continued for 2 weeks.
Light repaired.
No water and repeated calls. Still no response, pending for weeks.
Sewage overflow addressed late. Communication was poor.
Quick garbage clearance.
Road repair took more than 2 weeks. Quality not good.
Street lights repaired after several reminders.
Mosquito issue recurring. Fogging delayed again.
Some action taken on encroachment.
Pothole complaint pending. No update. Accident risk.
Garbage pickup resumed.
Late night loud music. Enforcement delayed.
Team responded quickly and handled stray dogs.
No water for many days. Very unhappy with delay and no communication.
Drain blockage and smell. Took long to clear.
